job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Job Description:</strong></p><p> <strong>A) Responsibilities to include but not limited to the following.</strong></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span></strong></p><p>1) Understand business objectives and develop models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress. </p><p>2) Analyze ML Algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem and ranking them by their success probability. </p><p>3) Explore and visualize data to gain an understanding of it, then identifying differences in data distribution that could affect performance when deploying the model in the real world.</p><p>4) Verify data quality, and/or ensuring it via data cleaning. </p><p>5) Supervise the data acquisition process if more data is needed. </p><p>6) Define validation strategies and define the preprocessing or feature engineering to be done on a given dataset. </p><p>7) Define and built data augmentation pipelines. </p><p>8) Train models and tune their hyperparameters. </p><p>9) Analyze the errors of the model and designing strategies to overcome them. </p><p><br></p><p><strong>B) Required Qualifications:</strong></p><p><br></p><p>1) Proficiency with Machine Learning frameworks e.g., Tensorflow or Keras.</p><p>2) Proficiency with Python libraries for machine learning such as scikit-learn and Pandas. </p><p>3) Expertise in visualizing and manipulating big data sets. </p><p>4) 3+ Years of industry experience in software engineering development. </p><p>5) Ability to independently and creatively solve problems.</p>
